title: Express Talk: Venetian Glass
hero_caption: <p>Venice (Italy), <em>Footed Bowl</em>, c. 1490. European Decorative Arts General Sales Proceeds Fund; restricted gift of the Antiquarian Society; Richard T. Cran …
description:
Join Camille Grand-Dewyse, Collections Manager in the department of European Decorative Arts, to learn about a new acquisition by the museum: a rare example of late 15th century Venetian glass recently acquired by the museum, colorfully decorated with sphinxes and cherubs.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
